attributes.action: to stop the nhs from refusing treatment to pepole who lead unhealthy lifestyles eg smokers, overweight ect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this is a money saving scam and it is discrmination against people who lead unhealthy lifestyle. 

would they do it to imigrants or is just for the british people?

rejection.details: The NHS does not refuse treatment to the groups you mention.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
